title: Ok, why the fuck can Akali drop turret aggro with her new W?
body: CertainlyT bullshit right there, typical. How did I know he was going to make an unbalanced mess again?

sure, but you know damn well that a shroud that lets her drop aggro multiple times in 5 seconds is nowhere on the same level as something with a 5 sec cooldown at max rank, and most of those aren't even that.

> [{quoted}](name=regaline,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VZruFEW5,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-07-16T21:42:15.773+0000)

Does it? I wasn't aware the final numbers, duration, and effect were all revealed. Also isn't {{champion:8}} w the exact same? Dropping turret aggro isn't anything new, and I personally love the mechanic. It adds pressure & skill to gameplay. Sure stopwatches needed to be tweaked, but i think they are really fun now.
Then again Vlad damages himself to use it, nor can he drop aggro multiple times in quick succession.
It just shows how bad you guys are at design.
A "recruiting coordinator" and a "live champion designer" are in COMPLETELY different fields.

It was a comment at RIOT in general not the Bazerka personally.

I fundamentally disagree with you that dropping turret aggro is a fun or interesting mechanic. 

The entire reason I stopped watching the LCS a few years ago was because Riot acknowledged that Elise was able to dive much earlier than other junglers because of her ability to drop turret aggro for 0 mana. They were testing a change where turrets "remembered" their target and then they just dropped that and never brought it up again. 

It's just another thing about pro play that has nothing to do with real League because there is no perfect coordination and absolutely precision striked dives at level 3 in the actual game.

> [{quoted}](name=The Yetii Rider,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VZruFEW5,comment-id=0001000000000009,timestamp=2018-07-17T01:07:58.407+0000)
>
> I fundamentally disagree with you that dropping turret aggro is a fun or interesting mechanic. 
> 
> The entire reason I stopped watching the LCS a few years ago was because Riot acknowledged that Elise was able to dive much earlier than other junglers because of her ability to drop turret aggro for 0 mana. They were testing a change where turrets "remembered" their target and then they just dropped that and never brought it up again. 
> 
> It's just another thing about pro play that has nothing to do with real League because there is no perfect coordination and absolutely precision striked dives at level 3 in the actual game.

you certainly have a right to disagree, but I don't think either of us are wrong. The "right" answer is up to the player to decide if its fun or not. Our job as game developers is to simply provide those options to engage with that fun.

> [{quoted}](name=Bazerka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VZruFEW5,comment-id=00010000000000090000,timestamp=2018-07-19T03:15:27.236+0000)
>
> you certainly have a right to disagree, but I don't think either of us are wrong. The "right" answer is up to the player to decide if its fun or not. Our job as game developers is to simply provide those options to engage with that fun.

You realize League of Legends is a multiplayer game and that players are forced to "engage with that fun" regardless of whether they find it fun or not. Also, it's very dishonest to call denying agency to the opposing players "engaging"

I love you coming on the boards but; Aww come on Bazerka you know akali's new shroud is a way different level. It's like looking at Kayn and Aaaaatroxx and saying both can go through walls.

The champs mentioned (and stop watch) have a single moment where they drop turret aggro. A single moment that you can plan and play around and wait for. Akali can legit just sit under enemy turret for five seconds at least.

I can just imagine that this new Akali is going to be just head burningly furious to play against if you're behind. **I IMAGINE** that when playing against a fed one that's competent, it  will feel like she has so many tools that out playing her doesn't feel like an option, you'll just have to wait for her to mess up.

I'd say hold off judgement until you play her. From PBE it looks like that analysis isn't the case.
I'm not really judging tbh, because i'm seeing the balance levers you guys are leaving (high energy costs, much less healing, the lack of resets). I'm just saying her W is a different level of strong

Lmao downvoted by 300 IQ armchair game designers on the boards. Akali's been playtested by Challenger players but obviously we must know better even though we've barely seen her in action.

you can't do that  i am a lux  mid main how can i play against her anymore even before rework she was so op and now even more !!!!? and sacrifice a small pang you are saying you don't give a shit about us but you do for pro ranked people is that it Riot ????

some emojis here would really help me know if you're being sarcastic or not XD

Really, with the outright hate you've received over the last 10 patches, I'd think you people were ready to reverse course by now. Apparently, you guys don't know when to quit. Nope, lets give assassins some invulnerability to the wet cardboard towers now. I think we all know how this is going to turn out.

It's one thing to be Vlad/Fizz/Elise and drop aggro once. You can still see them, time your attacks, etc to PLAN AGAINST THEM once they break their untargetability, and they can't become untargetable again for a while. However, it's another thing entirely to have a large zone where you can repeatedly run in and out of to break turret aggo as you destroy opponents. This ability is basically shitting on all of the rules in terms of sight and turrets, and there should absolutely be no defense of this from you guys. You guys know well enough how badly this new shroud breaks the rules, and you should then know how much of a pain and a nightmare it will be. Akali is ALREADY a balancing nightmare in the game because it's hard to deal with her shroud, and then CertainlyT somehow things it's OK to make the shroud _even worse_ in terms of counterplay? Come on. Surely your team isn't that head over heels for CertainlyT that you're so unable to see the sheer health problems this will add to the game. I thought you guys were beyond that.

just because someone else already has an ability like that doesnt mean we need more of it especially when it doesnt make any sense gameplay wise because turrets grant true vision please find another job

> [{quoted}](name=Aniohn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VZruFEW5,comment-id=000100000000000c,timestamp=2018-07-18T01:36:23.273+0000)

she dived me under harder than trynda and he needs to ult for that. looking forward to the nerfs

everyone like "who could beat one punch man"
I'm just here hoping nothing beats Bazerka the "FeelsGoodMan"
Vladimir's has a health cost and a 28 second cooldown base.  I'd say they are hardly comparable in terms of strength, and only comparable because of the fact that they do drop tower aggro.

> [{quoted}](name=Nanuk Pihoqahiak,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VZruFEW5,comment-id=000100000000000e,timestamp=2018-07-19T02:57:52.293+0000)

Idk about others, but for me the health cost on W is 0 cause of the Q heal. And if you know Akali's shroud CD lmk cause I don't even have that info o.o. All I'm saying is wait to compare, cause its not like we put a god mode invulnerability on her. There is always a cost. If her shroud is truly broken than hell yea, we gotta change it but we wont know unless we release it and test. Wait to complain until you try it yourself :)

> [{quoted}](name=Bazerka,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VZruFEW5,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-07-16T21:58:03.887+0000)

Dropping turret aggro isn't anything new, and I personally love the mechanic. It adds pressure & skill to gameplay. Sure stopwatches needed to be tweaked, but i think they are really fun now.

I’m a little late here but I agree to some extent. When I’m playing champions like fizz it is SO satisfying outplaying someone and escaping a tower shot with a W.

It’s a matter of the immobile champs without much against this. Playing  Immobile mages feels so torturous against these

tldr; super fun to play but mages need some tools to survive

Untargetability is not new, but tying partial untargetability to Akali's stealth certainly is. It is also worth mentioning that champions with the ability to evade turret shots, e.g. Vlad, Fizz, Elise, etc., generally pay a high price for it, whether it be with a health cost (e.g. Vlad) or by using their biggest gapcloser. Meanwhile, Akali has four other dashes, or at least two pre-6, on top of her aggro-dropping ability, and runs on energy, which suggests that tower diving would be relatively cheap to her.

If Akali is able to push up under tower then she can act freely harass the enemy under tower for X seconds and as long as she has minions

Tower fires at minion then Akali harass opponent and goes back to stealth and drop aggro and then repeat for as long as the shroud/minion wave lasts (warning be careful of CC when the minion wave is almost dead or the enemy jungler)
Don’t you think it’s over kill. The fact then it’s basically any mage will fall to akali..

Hey Bazerka, Could you find out if she will always take a tower shot if she grabs aggro? it looks like the stealth is set so she cant break aggro with out getting hit, I cant tell if that's cuz of the players in the vids I saw having bad timing or an intended balance.

You weren't aware? I thought you guys would take confirmed leaks more seriously. 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UOq3Zk-LQT0

Vlad's W is not the same, because he can only use it to drop aggro once and then it goes on cooldown. Akali can drop W and then run in and out of turret while resetting its ramping damage repeatedly during a solo dive. People have been complaining about turrets being too weak for years now, and this goes to show that you guys literally just don't care.
I respect you posting truth like this, but sadly the salty bois will just dump their salt, bad attitudes, and downvotes on you when you try and truth them.

Where can Aatrox drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting? Where can Elise drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting? Where can Evelynn drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting? Where can Ekko drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting? Where can Camille drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting? Where can fizz drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting? Where can Kled drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting? Where can Xayah drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting? Where can Zed drop tower aggro more than once in a single sitting?

They don't, they all have something in common: It's a once use thing, meaning that they either commit fully, or they disengage completely. Akali's new W is different, where she can place it, walk in it, walk out of it, and get her stealth back again, dropping turret aggro multiple times.

and unlike them, everytime she drops the aggro SHE TAKES FULL DAMAGE OF THE TOWER SHOT 

this boards is fucking unreal

I really hope you're joking with this thread

Yeah but they're either dropping turret agro by ult or when they do drop turret agro they cant drop it again less than a second later, nor can they stay under turret for 5+ seconds without taking agro.
I mean, it isn't like ***half of assassins can drop aggro anyways*** or anything.

Classic Forum though process: Do not like a part of a kit based off of how it sounds?

Check if CertianlyT was a part of the development:
if Yes, say its his fault
If, No just complain about it.

From what I have seen, she is revealed under towers, but cant be autoed. Ability's should still hit her, should be annoying for marksmen and auto champions. In the vid I saw, Shroud duration recloak looks to be set so that she will get hit by a tower after attracting aggro. I don't know if that's intentionally in place for balance or if it was just the player had bad timing on tower shots.

I think im gonna wait and see befor making any judgments on it.
